previewArticle.title: World Cup: Cristiano Ronaldo, Pepe, Raul Meireles will not play in Portugal’s friendly vs. Mexico

recapArticle.title: Mexico 0, Portugal 1 | International Friendly Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Miguel Layún (Mexico) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by João Pereira (Portugal).

timelineItems.name: Diego Pinzón
timelineItems.text: Pónganle un ojo a Éder en el Mundial. Abre espacios muy fácil, y su potencia en el juego áereo será determinante. #MEXvPOR

timelineItems.name: Fake JP Dellacamera
timelineItems.text: Mexico have us to thanks for being in the World Cup. Get those studs up, hombres. #MEXvPOR

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Rafael Márquez (Mexico).
Eder (Portugal) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Angela Asante
timelineItems.text: Glad to see Nani in action. Can't wait to see him leave Man United and rekindle his career!!! #MUFC #Portugal #Mexico

timelineItems.name: Eddie Gomez
timelineItems.text: #ElTri is playing and attacking without fear that's how you got to play stronger teams! Show no fear #mexicovsportugal #mexico

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Portugal. Conceded by Jose de Jesús Corona.

timelineItems.name: Carlos Alonso
timelineItems.text: Portugal jugando a lo mismo y México con la posesión! La fiebre mundialista ya me esta afectando ! #QuieroCreer

timelineItems.name: Diego Pinzón
timelineItems.text: Flojísimo el funcionamiento de México en los primeros 15 minutos. La conexión Nani+Coentrao+Vieirinha, es impresionante. #MEXvPOR

timelineItems.comment: Giovani dos Santos (Mexico) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Nani (Portugal).
Attempt saved. Vieirinha (Portugal) left footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by João Pereira.
Offside, Mexico. Paul Aguilar tries a through ball, but Oribe Peralta is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Andy Warner
timelineItems.text: Good effort Vierhinha! #MEXvPOR

timelineItems.name: KnickerBocker LeBeau
timelineItems.text: WOW!!! an even better save by #Portugal defense #MexicoVsPortugal #MexVsPor

timelineItems.name: Selección Mexicana
timelineItems.text: #1T 14' MEX 0-0 POR ¡Cerca @Cpillo24! A centro de Aguilar no logra rematar. #QuieroCreer

timelineItems.name: Fernando Guerrero
timelineItems.text: Se ve Mexico. Me gusta lo que veo, con buen ritmo a comparacion del Miercoles contra Bosnia. #QuieroCreer #VamosMexico

timelineItems.name: Rebeca Hernandez
timelineItems.text: Lo que me encanta es el ambiente del estadio para Mexico! #VamosMexico #MexicoVsPortugal

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Miguel Layún (Mexico) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Andrés Guardado.

timelineItems.name: Marta Dhanis
timelineItems.text: Let's go #Portugal #mexicovsportugal #Mexico http://t.co/jsWOEfT8vG

timelineItems.name: Marta Dhanis
timelineItems.text: Let's go #Portugal #mexicovsportugal #Mexico http://t.co/jsWOEfT8vG

timelineItems.name: The Mid Life
timelineItems.text: Portugal making great plays #MEXvPOR

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Eder (Portugal) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by André Almeida with a cross.
Match ends, Mexico 0, Portugal 1.

timelineItems.name: Carla LR
timelineItems.text: #QuieroCreer... Jugamos como nunca, perdimos como siempre �

timelineItems.name: Nicholas A. Reasner
timelineItems.text: ...that is why it is dangerous to play a team like Portugal. Even without CR7. #MEXvPOR

timelineItems.name: armando iturbe
timelineItems.text: Buena exhibición nacional, el resultado lo de menos HOY .. Con el juego de hoy se puede competir ! #QuieroCreer #VamosMexico :)

timelineItems.name: Diego Pinzón
timelineItems.text: Aquí mi crónica: http://t.co/mayEAtJM8q. Dedicada a Bruno Alves que me cambió todo al final. #MEXvPOR

timelineItems.name: Periódico a.m.
timelineItems.text: #ELTRI México hasta ahora con la posesión de la pelota en medio campo, pero sin encontrar prufundidad en el marco contrario.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Héctor Moreno (Mexico) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.

timelineItems.name: Hugo Caraballo
timelineItems.text: Y Cristiano Ronaldo, que no ha jugado un solo amistoso. Creo que es lo mejor que le puede pasar a #Portugal.

timelineItems.comment: Héctor Moreno (Mexico) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Miguel Veloso (Portugal).
Attempt saved. Eder (Portugal) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Fábio Coentrão.

timelineItems.name: Diego Pinzón
timelineItems.text: Y pensar que a esta Portugal le hace falta Cristiano. Nani y Coentrao se están dando un banquete con la línea de cinco de México. #MEXvPOR

timelineItems.comment: João Moutinho (Portugal) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Héctor Moreno (Mexico).

timelineItems.name: Mauricio Banegas
timelineItems.text: No hay que olvidar que en éste internacional amistoso se enfrentan 2 escuadras de repechaje, #México #Portugal.

timelineItems.name: Justin Churchill
timelineItems.text: Corona is not shying away from contact, good sign. #mexicovsportugal #Mexico #Portugal

timelineItems.comment: João Moutinho (Portugal) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Oribe Peralta (Mexico).

timelineItems.name: Eric Krakauer
timelineItems.text: Have to think that #Portugal's decision to sit deep is a planned attempt to work on counter attack. #PortugalVsMexico

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: After a feeling out period for about the first 12 minutes of this match, #Portugal has been the better side with three decent chances so far
